p: Future development will focus on utilizing RUTI as an adjunct to drug treatment in patients with MDR-TB, to prevent disease relapse after treatment for drug-sensitive TB, and to shorten the drug treatment regimen. A phase 2a trial to evaluate the safety and immunogenicity of RUTI in MDR-TB patients favorably responding to standard MDR-TB treatment is scheduled to begin early 2019, with a plan for a subsequent phase 2b-phase 3 pivotal clinical trial in this population (NCT02711735).
